mapper.insert: INSERT INTO D_ACCINFO (acc_id, acc_type, acc_dtype, occr_date, occr_time, end_date, end_time, info, longitude, latitude) VALUES ( #{accId}, #{accType}, #{accDtype}, #{occrDate}, #{occrTime}, #{endDate}, #{endTime}, #{info}, #{longitude}, #{latitude} )
mapper.select: SELECT dai.acc_id as accId, dat.acc_name AS accName, dad.acc_dname AS accDname, dai.occr_date, dai.occr_time, dai.end_date, dai.end_time, dai.info, dai.longitude, dai.latitude FROM D_ACCINFO dai JOIN D_ACC_TYPE dat ON dai.acc_type = dat.acc_type JOIN D_ACC_DTYPE dad ON dai.acc_dtype = dad.acc_dtype WHERE ACC_ID = #{accId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.ACC_ID as accId, A.ACC_TYPE as accType, T.ACC_NAME as accName, A.ACC_DTYPE as accDtype, D.ACC_DNAME as accDName, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.OCCR_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS occrDate, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.OCCR_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 'HH24:MI:SS') AS occrTime, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS endDate, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.END_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 'HH24:MI:SS') AS endTime, A.INFO as info, A.LONGITUDE as longitude, A.LATITUDE as latitude FROM D_ACCINFO A JOIN D_ACC_TYPE T ON A.ACC_TYPE = T.ACC_TYPE JOIN D_ACC_DTYPE D ON A.ACC_DTYPE = D.ACC_DTYPE )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T.ACC_NAME as accName, A.ACC_DTYPE as accDtype, D.ACC_DNAME as accDName, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.OCCR_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS occrDate, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.OCCR_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 'HH24:MI:SS') AS occrTime, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS endDate, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.END_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 'HH24:MI:SS') AS endTime, A.INFO as info, A.LONGITUDE as longitude, A.LATITUDE as latitude FROM D_ACCINFO A JOIN D_ACC_TYPE T ON A.ACC_TYPE = T.ACC_TYPE JOIN D_ACC_DTYPE D ON A.ACC_DTYPE = D.ACC_DTYPE WHERE A.ACC_DTYPE LIKE '01%' )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T.ACC_NAME as accName, A.ACC_DTYPE as accDtype, D.ACC_DNAME as accDName, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.OCCR_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS occrDate, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.OCCR_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 'HH24:MI:SS') AS occrTime, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS endDate, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.END_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 'HH24:MI:SS') AS endTime, A.INFO as info, A.LONGITUDE as longitude, A.LATITUDE as latitude FROM D_ACCINFO A JOIN D_ACC_TYPE T ON A.ACC_TYPE = T.ACC_TYPE JOIN D_ACC_DTYPE D ON A.ACC_DTYPE = D.ACC_DTYPE WHERE A.ACC_DTYPE LIKE '02%' )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T.ACC_NAME as accName, A.ACC_DTYPE as accDtype, D.ACC_DNAME as accDName, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.OCCR_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS occrDate, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.OCCR_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 'HH24:MI:SS') AS occrTime, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS endDate, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.END_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 'HH24:MI:SS') AS endTime, REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(A.INFO, CHR(13) || CHR(10), ' '), CHR(13), ' '), CHR(10), ' ') AS info, -- CRLF, CR, LF 처리 A.LONGITUDE as longitude, A.LATITUDE as latitude FROM D_ACCINFO A JOIN D_ACC_TYPE T ON A.ACC_TYPE = T.ACC_TYPE JOIN D_ACC_DTYPE D ON A.ACC_DTYPE = D.ACC_DTYPE WHERE A.ACC_DTYPE LIKE '04%' )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T.ACC_NAME as accName, A.ACC_DTYPE as accDtype, D.ACC_DNAME as accDName, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.OCCR_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS occrDate, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.OCCR_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 'HH24:MI:SS') AS occrTime, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS endDate, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.END_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 'HH24:MI:SS') AS endTime, A.INFO as info, A.LONGITUDE as longitude, A.LATITUDE as latitude FROM D_ACCINFO A JOIN D_ACC_TYPE T ON A.ACC_TYPE = T.ACC_TYPE JOIN D_ACC_DTYPE D ON A.ACC_DTYPE = D.ACC_DTYPE WHERE A.ACC_DTYPE LIKE '11%' )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T.ACC_NAME as accName, A.ACC_DTYPE as accDtype, D.ACC_DNAME as accDName, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.OCCR_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS occrDate, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.OCCR_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 'HH24:MI:SS') AS occrTime, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS endDate, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.END_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 'HH24:MI:SS') AS endTime, A.INFO as info, A.LONGITUDE as longitude, A.LATITUDE as latitude FROM D_ACCINFO A JOIN D_ACC_TYPE T ON A.ACC_TYPE = T.ACC_TYPE JOIN D_ACC_DTYPE D ON A.ACC_DTYPE = D.ACC_DTYPE WHERE A.ACC_DTYPE IN ('10B02','04B04') )
